page.title: 10Communications-bypasses
page.content:
Fortunately for the peace of Baldock residents, the A1(M) bypass runs to the west of the block, taking N-S through traffic with it.
However, there is still a traffic problem as the main E-W route from Cambridge to Luton (A505) runs diagonally through the block to the Baldock traffic lights. This section of road is probably the most dangerous in Herts., as from the lights to the dual carriageway on the eastern edge of the block, the single carriageway twists deceptively, causing impatient drivers to overtake unwisely.
Plans for an E-W bypass for Baldock include a Northern route, running through the block, but this is still under discussion.
